definition[0]: to watch or listen to a broadcast on radio or television
example[0]: More than 150 million Americans tuned in to watch the final episode.
example[1]: People get their information by tuning in to foreign radio stations.
definition[1]: to realize or understand what is happening or what other people are thinking
